thread.title: The Best Celebrity Beauty Looks: Olivia Palermo, Sienna Miller, and More - Vogue
thread.title_full: The Best Celebrity Beauty Looks: Olivia Palermo, Sienna Miller, and More - Vogue

title: The Best Celebrity Beauty Looks: Olivia Palermo, Sienna Miller, and More - Vogue
text: View Slideshow Photo: Getty Images Here’s what’s magical about fashion month: The runways act as a cornucopia of trends to come, while front row fixtures have their finger firmly on the up-to-the-minute hair and makeup pulse—together setting off to a cascading effect that inspires the red carpet crowd to bring their black tie A-game. No wonder the week’s best beauty looks were overwhelmingly an evening affair. At the Lost City of Z premiere in London, FKA twigs showed off a fresh constellation of braids, perhaps prompting costar Sienna Miller to rework her long blonde waves with a few slim plaits of her own. Over in Houston, Ashley Graham supercharged her signature cat eyes with a swingy high ponytail, while fellow Sports Illustrated babe Chrissy Teigen ditched the beachy bombshell formula for hair that was slicked clean down the middle—a knockout minimalist look that fashion’s golden girl, Gigi Hadid , also took to shiny new heights in London. Breezy waves had their moment, too, most notably on an effortlessly windswept Olivia Palermo. But if the art of the perfect air-dry proves elusive, make like Sly’s daughter Sistine Stallone and break out the flat iron.
